Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm Paul, an Android app developer. I'm here to ask/beg anyone for a working copy of the Compiler.exe, the project source from here: https://github.com/textadventures/quest I'm familiar with IDE's such as Eclipse, Netbeans etc, but have never worked with VB Studio and frankly, I'm scratching my head. I've had to borrow a Win7 laptop from a friend for the day to run VB Studio express 2012 and I'm running out of time to get the compiler built. I had a steep learning curve this morning getting referenced libraries added and cleaning the project and am now down to one error on a build and I'm stuck. From what I can understand, the build doesn't know what the main class is. I assume the main class is/should be in Compiler.cs. By manually adding 'a' main class I can compile the exe, but it doesn't run. I know I'm missing some fundamental concept but time's running out to dig into it. Any help/advice/**shared .exe** would be very much appreciated! Paul.
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I'm Paul, an Android app developer.

I'm here to ask/beg anyone for a working copy of the Compiler.exe, the project source from here:
https://github.com/textadventures/quest

I'm familiar with IDE's such as Eclipse, Netbeans etc, but have never worked with VB Studio and frankly, I'm scratching my head. I've had to borrow a Win7 laptop from a friend for the day to run VB Studio express 2012 and I'm running out of time to get the compiler built. I had a steep learning curve this morning getting referenced libraries added and cleaning the project and am now down to one error on a build and I'm stuck.

From what I can understand, the build doesn't know what the main class is. I assume the main class is/should be in Compiler.cs. By manually adding 'a' main class I can compile the exe, but it doesn't run. I know I'm missing some fundamental concept but time's running out to dig into it.

Any help/advice/**shared .exe** would be very much appreciated!

Paul.

Posts.EditableText: I've now uploaded a build here: https://github.com/textadventures/quest ... v0.1-alpha What build error did you get, by the way?
Posts.HTML:
I've now uploaded a build here: https://github.com/textadventures/quest ... v0.1-alpha

What build error did you get, by the way?

Posts.EditableText: Thank you Alex! I haven't got the exact error message, the laptop has gone. To be honest it's probably irrelevant, it'll certainly be because of my lack of understanding of VB. It was to do with the build process not recognizing the main class of the project. Anyway, the compiler from GH is working great! So far
Posts.HTML:
Thank you Alex!

I haven't got the exact error message, the laptop has gone. To be honest it's probably irrelevant, it'll certainly be because of my lack of understanding of VB. It was to do with the build process not recognizing the main class of the project.

Anyway, the compiler from GH is working great! So far
